name: Stephen J. MORGO, Petitioner, v. STATE EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT BOARD, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Morgo v. State Employees Retirement Board

parties: Stephen J. MORGO, Petitioner, v. STATE EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT BOARD, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The Order of the Commonwealth Court entered on April 10, 1992 at No. 754 C.D.1991 is reversed, and the matter is remanded to the State Employees’ Retirement Board for determination of Petitioner’s pension benefits. See Glancey v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, State Employees Retirement Board, 530 Pa. 481, 610 A.2d 15 (1992).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
617 A.2d 1270
Stephen J. MORGO, Petitioner, v. STATE EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT BOARD, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 20, 1993.
